org.apache.storm.perf

Class KafkaHdfsTopo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.perf.KafkaHdfsTopo

  • public class KafkaHdfsTopo
extends Object

    This topo helps measure speed of reading from Kafka and writing to Hdfs. Spout Reads from Kafka. Bolt writes to Hdfs
